title: Clear Caches - EN
text:
1 -) Click on Home
2 -) Click on Menu
3 -) Click on Settings
4 -) Click on Clear Cache button

This helps remove temporary files and can make your app run faster and smoother!

title: Copy Trading History - EN
text:
1 -) Click on Futures
2 -) Click on Copy button
3 -) Click on Copy on right bottom corner
4 -) You can see the 'Ongoing - Closed' Copy Portfolios in this page.

title: Futures Swap Button (BNFCR) - EN
text:
You can't directly transfer the BNFCR back to spot wallet so you need to swap it BNB - BTC or ETH to transfer it back to spot wallet.

To do that, you can follow the steps in the screenshot:

1 -) Click on Assets
2 -) Click on Futures
3 -) Click on USDS-M Futures
4 -) Click on SWAP

In the SWAP page, you can select the BNFCR and Swap it to one of the supported coins (ETH-BNB or BTC)

Then once you have one these assets can transfer it back to spot wallet as well.

title: System Feedback - EN
text:
To send the System Feedback from Binance Mobile App, please follow the steps on the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on the Home 
2 -) Click on the Menu 
3 -) Click on the Settings
4 -) Click on ''Help & Support'' tab 
5 -) Click on ''System Feedback''
6 -) Click on ''SEND'' 
7 -) Wait for Success notification to pop-ups. 

After you follow the related steps which I also provided as screenshot then please let me know so I can tell tech team that you completed the System Feedback.

title: Futures Transaction History (Export) - EN
text:
Please click on Futures and then the ''history icon'' like I marked. 

Then go to ''Transaction History'' tab an click on ''Export'' button on top right corner. 

You will see the Export tab, in there: 

 Select: Beyond 90 Days

The timeline can be 12 months only so if you are looking for the last 2-5 years, you can simply create yearly transaction history such as:

2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31
2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31
2022-01-01 to 2022-12-31
2023-01-01 to 2023-12-31
2024-01-01 to 2024-12-31

This way you can create transaction history files for each year separately .

title: Transfer From Cross Margin To Spot - EN
text:
1 -) Click on Asset
2 -) Click on Spot
3 -) Click on Cross Margin
4 -) Click on Transfer

You will see the Transfer page like this... In here you need to click on the arrows on right. 

5 -) Click on Arrows

6 -) Correct Pathway: 

From: Cross Margin
To: Spot Wallet

Select Your Coin, the amount and and confirm the transfer. 

With this steps, you can transfer all your assets from Cross Margin to Spot Wallet.

title: Cooling-Off Period - EN
text:
You can disable your Futures Trading on your account. You have cooling off function for this: 

1 -) Please click on the ''...'' icon on Futures Trading page 

2 -) Click on ''Cooling-Off Period'' 

3 -) Click on the Enable button. 

4 -) Then you can select the cooling off period such as: 

1 Day
1 Week 
1 Month
Indefinite (This will restrict the futures trading forever) 

Once you activate the cooling off period. You won't be able to trade Futures so you will disable the futures trading. 

Please note that once you activated Cooling Off Period, we can't assist you to disable it. 

What Is the Cooling Period Function and How to Use It?
https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/detail/ad7fd07f63a64954a6d6e9257d16adcc

title: Mark Price Chart - EN
text:
To see the Mark Price chart, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click On Futures 

2 -) Click On the Chart Icon

3 -) Click on Last Price button above the chart

4 -) Select Mark Price 

This way you can see the real-time mark price chart.

To Learn More about the difference between Mark Price and Last Price, you can check this official guide as well: 

What Is the Difference Between a Futures Contract’s Last Price and Mark Price?
https://www.binance.com/en/blog/futures/5704082076024731087

title: Funding Fee History - EN
text:
To see the Funding Fee History on your Mobile App, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click On Futures

2 -) Click on the History Icon

3 -) Scroll on the right on upper menu and click on Funding Fee 

In this page you can see how much funding fee you received or paid in details.

title: Mock Trading - EN
text:
To reach the Mock Trading/Demo Trading page, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' icon on top right corner

3 -) On the pop-up menu click on ''Mock Trading'' 

This way you can access to the Mock Trading page.

title: LOAN HISTORY (ONGOING LOANS) - EN
text:
To see your ongoing Loan orders or your Loan history, you can follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Home button 

2 -) Click on ''More'' 

3 -) Scroll Down on that page and find ''Loans'' under Finance. 

4 -) Click on The History Icon on Top Right Corner

In that page you can see your ongoing Loans and your Loan history.

title: Transfer From Spot Wallet to Isolated Margin - EN
text:
To Transfer assets from Spot Wallet to Isolated Margin, please follow the steps in the above screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Assets
2 -) Click on Spot 
3 -) Click On Isolated Margin
4 -) Click On Transfer 

The correct pathway: 

From: Spot Wallet
To: Isolated Margin 

5 -) Select the Pair you want to transfer into by clicking the pair name. 

6 -) Click on the Asset you want to transfer 

Select the Amount and Confirm transfer. 

This is how you transfer into the Isolated Margin.

title: Transfer From Isolated Margin to Spot Wallet - EN
text:
To Transfer assets from Isolated Margin to Spot Wallet, please follow the steps in the above screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Assets
2 -) Click on Spot 
3 -) Click On Isolated Margin
4 -) Click On Transfer 
5 -) Click on the Arrows to change the pathway, the correct pathway: 

From: Isolated Margin
To: Spot Wallet

6 -) Select the Pair you want to transfer into by clicking the pair name. 

7 -) Click on the Asset you want to transfer 

Select the Amount and Confirm transfer. 

This is how you transfer from Isolated Margin to Spot Wallet.

title: Transfer From Spot Wallet to Cross Margin - EN
text:
To Transfer From Spot Wallet to Cross Margin, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Assets
2 -) Click on Spot
3 -) Click on Cross Margin
4 -) Click on Transfer

5 -) The Correct path: 

From: Spot Wallet
To: Cross Margin 

6 -) Select the Asset you want to transfer

Select the amount and confirm the transfer. 

This is how you transfer assets from spot wallet to cross margin.

title: Mark Price Chart - RU
text:
Чтобы изменить вид графика цен с Последняя цена на Цена маркировки, выполните следующие действия, изображённые на снимке экрана:

1) Нажмите на «Фьючерсы»

2) Нажмите на значок «График»

3) Нажмите на кнопку «Последняя цена» над графиком

4) В меню ниже нажмите на «Цена маркировки»

Вот как изменить вид графика на «Цена маркировки», чтобы увидеть график Цена маркировки.

title: Mark Price Chart - VI
text:
Để thay đổi biểu đồ giá từ '' Giá gàn nhất '' sang '' Giá đánh dấu '', vui lòng làm theo các bước trong ảnh chụp màn hình:

1 -) Nhấp vào '' Futures ''

2 -) Nhấp vào ''Biểu tượng biểu đồ''

3 -) Nhấp vào nút '' Giá gàn nhất
 '' phía trên biểu đồ

4 -) Trong menu bật lên bên dưới, nhấp vào '' Giá đánh dấu ''

Đây là cách bạn thay đổi biểu đồ thành '' Giá đánh dấu '' để xem biểu đồ Giá đánh dấu.

title: Mark Price Chart - AR
text:
لتغيير مخطط أسعارك من اخر سعر إلى السعر العادل، يُرجى اتباع الخطوات الموضحة في لقطة الشاشة:

‎1-)‎ انقر على "العقود الآجلة"

‎2-)‎ انقر على "أيقونة المخطط"

‎3-)‎ انقر على زر "اخر سعر" أعلى المخطط.

‎4-)‎ من القائمة المنبثقة أدناه، انقر على "السعر العادل".

هكذا يمكنك تغيير مخططك إلى "السعر العادل" لعرض مخطط السعر العادل.

title: Change Asset Mode (Single,Multi) - EN
text:
To change Asset Mode, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' Icon on top right corner.

3 -) Click on ''Preferences'' on the pop-up menu.

4 -) Click on Asset Mode button.

5 -) In this page you can change your asset mode.

title: Change Position Mode (One-Way,Multi) - EN
text:
To Change Asset Mode, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' Icon on top right corner.

3 -) Click on ''Preferences'' on the pop-up menu.

4 -) Click on Position Mode button.

5 -) In this page you can change your Position mode.

title: Change Button Settings in Positions - EN
text:
To Change Asset Mode, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' Icon on top right corner.

3 -) Click on ''Preferences'' on the pop-up menu.

4 -) Click on Button Settings In Positions.

5 -) In this page you can change your Button settings on the open positions. You can enable or the disable options you prefer.

title: Loan Repayment (Collateral) - EN
text:
There are two ways to repay an ongoing loan

Borrowed Coin
Collateral 

So if you wish to repay an ongoing Loan with the collateral amount, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on ''Ongoing Orders'' on Loan Orders Page
2 -) Click on ''Repay'' 
3 -) Click on ''Collateral'' on upper menu

Enter the amount you wish to repay and you will see the LTV after repayment and the amount of collateral will return after the repayment on the details as well. 

This is how you repay an ongoing Loan with Collateral.

title: Loan Repayment (Borrowed Coin) - EN
text:
There are two ways to repay an ongoing loan

Borrowed Coin
Collateral 

So if you wish to repay an ongoing Loan with the borrowed coin, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on ''Ongoing Orders'' on Loan Orders Page
2 -) Click on ''Repay'' 
3 -) Click on ''Borrowed Coin'' on upper menu

Enter the amount you wish to repay and you will see the LTV after repayment and the amount of collateral will return after the repayment on the details as well. 

This is how you repay an ongoing Loan with Borrowed Coin.

title: Portfolio Margin (Enable,Disable) - EN
text:
To change between Classic Trading and Portfolio Margin, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' Icon on top right corner.

3 -) Click on ''Portfolio Margin'' button on the pop-up menu.

4 -) In this page you can change between Classic Trading and Portfolio Margin. 

To Learn more about Portfolio Margin, here are some detailed guides: 
https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/detail/bddd924496d74ecd8820a6d95585ccee

title: Futures Referral Page - EN
text:
To create your Futures Referral Code, please follow the steps in the screenshot: 

1 -) Click on Futures

2 -) Click on the ''...'' Icon on top right corner.

3 -) Click on '' Futures Referral '' button.

4 -) Click on ''Invite Now''

5 -) In this page you can copy your Futures referral code, or change/customize your referral code. 

To Learn More About the Futures Referral Rules: 
https://www.binance.com/en/support/faq/detail/d10f95a5ac8847bdb6f422a26921745d
